Screens.Text: This is the first page of an example tutorial using the data driven tutorials! You can make more like this.
This is the second page of an example tutorial.
Press Y to channel starlight to see ancient knowledge about what your mouse is hovering over.

Press [c/6699FF:SHIFT] while holding any combination of [c/6699FF:W], [c/6699FF:A], [c/6699FF:S], and [c/6699FF:D] to channel starlight into a powerful dash.

You'll strike with enough force to shatter any object with a [c/88FFFF:glowing blue outline!]
